text: Marks and Spencer plc (also known as M&S;) is a major British retailer headquartered in the City of Westminster, London. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 250 Index It specialises in the selling of clothing, home products and luxury food products. M&S; was founded in 1884 by Michael Marks and Thomas Spencer in Leeds. It has 979 stores across the U.K. including 615 that only sell food products. == References == Category:Companies listed on the London Stock Exchange Category:Supermarkets of the United Kingdom Category:1884 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Marks & Spencer
